programme.title: Million Dollar Listing New York
programme.desc: A re-energized Luis reaches out to old friends in an effort to close a deal that has eluded him in the past; Fredrik faces competition while trying to win a project; fiancée Emilia has news that catches Ryan off guard.

programme.title: Million Dollar Listing New York
programme.desc: Fredrik takes buyers on a Hudson River cruise to interest them in his new West Side development; Luis and a developer embark on a plan to create a massive unit overlooking Central Park, but one of Ryan's clients may stop them dead in their tracks.

programme.title: Million Dollar Listing New York
programme.desc: Luis tries to lure Ryan back to the negotiating table after the two reach a stalemate over the Central Park South unit; Ryan must salvage a deal that falls through after the buyer is arrested; Fredrik will stop at nothing to impress a client.

programme.title: Million Dollar Listing New York
programme.desc: Luis will do anything to solidify his standing as a major player, even if it means teaming up with a rival; Fredrik receives devastating news; Ryan uses out-of-the-box thinking to come up with a way to lure brokers to an out-of-the-way listing.

programme.title: Million Dollar Listing New York
programme.desc: At the Metropolitan Tower, Luis and Ryan run into complications while co-listing; Ryan's fiancée, Emilia, gets in the middle of things; Fredrik lands a heavenly listing with a hellish downside.

programme.title: Million Dollar Listing New York
programme.desc: Ryan tries the buyers' patience while trying out a new pricing strategy for a downtown duplex; Fredrik promises a buyer something his developer may not be able to deliver; Luis and a new co-lister dig a hole for themselves.

programme.title: Million Dollar Listing New York
programme.desc: Fredrik reunites with a former client in the Williamsburg neighborhood; Luis hopes to repair his rocky relationship with a rebellious co-lister; Ryan tackles an enormous townhouse that may be too big for most New Yorkers.

programme.title: Million Dollar Listing New York
programme.desc: A telephone call breathes new life into a development project, but it comes with a catch Fredrik never saw coming; Ryan bends over backward for a potential buyer but receives nothing in return; Luis gets first dibs on a hot new Tribeca building.

programme.title: Million Dollar Listing New York
programme.desc: For a new development in the NoHo neighborhood, Fredrik summons the spirit of a dead icon; after a failed shot, Luis chases down one of New York City's biggest developers; Ryan picks up a penthouse in the Flatiron District with a difficult co-lister.

programme.title: Million Dollar Listing New York
programme.desc: Ryan's relationship with his co-lister hangs by a thread, prompting him to try something new; Luis finds himself caught in the middle while trying to please a married couple; Fredrik hopes a rival will save him after the developer raises prices.

programme.title: Million Dollar Listing New York
programme.desc: Luis lands a listing with a former broker who helped him launch his career; Fredrik struggles to sell a $30 billion penthouse in Tribeca; Ryan tries to save his skin after showing too much of someone else's in a marketing campaign.

programme.title: Million Dollar Listing New York
programme.desc: Fredrik confronts a broker who is circling his $30 million penthouse like a vulture; Luis will do anything for a buyer and dog; a delighted Ryan lands a listing that previously belonged to Fredrik.

programme.title: Million Dollar Listing New York
programme.desc: Luis faces an emotional crossroads; Fredrik tries to cash in on a NoHo loft that once was the site of the country's largest bank robbery; in Tribeca, Ryan tries to succeed where Fredrik failed.

programme.title: Million Dollar Listing New York
programme.desc: Ryan trades his suit for a more unique outfit after landing a building in Hell's Kitchen; Luis' idea of having a business partner gets more complicated when an open house challenges him to think about his future; Fredrik goes to London.

programme.title: Million Dollar Listing New York
programme.desc: Luis tries to figure out what's been confusing him lately while hoping to land a building on Park Avenue South; Ryan goes after the one listing that got away from him; Ryan shows up at Fredrik's launch party.

programme.title: Million Dollar Listing New York
programme.desc: Fredrik and Ryan are joined by Steve Gold, a former fashion model who has become a successful agent, specializing in luxury properties; Ryan hopes to sell 50 houses in three months; a newly calm Fredrik meets a Tribeca seller who won't negotiate..

programme.title: Million Dollar Listing New York
programme.desc: Ryan and his Brooklyn team sell as many houses as possible; in order for Fredrik to land a building in SoHo, he has to prove that he's done his homework; Steve wonders if he's become a babysitter when his young clients refuse to behave.

programme.title: Million Dollar Listing New York
programme.desc: Fredrik needs to find a back-up buyer, and Bethenny Frankel is at the top of his contact list; Ryan lands two townhouses but ends up competing against himself; Steve gets a listing, loses a listing and gets another listing.

programme.title: Million Dollar Listing New York
programme.desc: Fredrik lands a building with $400 million dollars in potential sales, but his boss thinks he may have over-promised in order to get it; Ryan juggles two sellers; Steve gets a list of demands from a broker and makes one of his own.

programme.title: Million Dollar Listing New York
programme.desc: In the hopes of selling a $20 million unit in his new mega-tower, Fredrik calls on everyone he knows, including agent Michael Lorber; Ryan goes toe-to-toe with his buyer's wingman, social media influencer The Fat Jewish.

programme.title: Million Dollar Listing New York
programme.desc: When Ryan lands a $25 million dollar listing in Tribeca, he calls upon his most intense team member for help; in Chelsea, Steve's listing for his friend, Sam, continues to have problems, but it's nothing compared to his dating life.

programme.title: Million Dollar Listing New York
programme.desc: When a seller demands Ryan remove his team member from a $25 million Tribeca listing, he hatches a plan that includes a secret twist; Steve lands an opportunity to sell an amazing $18 million SoHo penthouse; Fredrik and Ryan reconnect with Luis.

programme.title: Million Dollar Listing New York
programme.desc: Fredrik begins questioning the effects of gentrification as he sells his $225 million development in the historic East Village; Ryan starts to doubt his sales strategy; Steve's co-lister tests his patience, nerves and even his bicycling skills.

programme.title: Million Dollar Listing New York
programme.desc: Steve seeks to convince potential buyers that the only thing better than their Tribeca apartment is his listing right above it; a prominent developer embarrasses Ryan at a birthday party; Fredrik forges a bond with his driver, Alberto.

programme.title: Million Dollar Listing New York
programme.desc: Fredrik tries to set records at the open house for his Park Slope brownstone; even though Ryan's business is booming, he finds himself down in the dumps; Steve encourages a friend to sell his Soho loft and receives an offer from an unexpected source.

programme.title: Million Dollar Listing New York
programme.desc: Fredrik has a strategy for his new Nolita building, designed by Lenny Kravitz and his team, and he's going to need his passport; Ryan befriends a quirky apartment owner, only to find the rug being pulled out from under him.

programme.title: Million Dollar Listing New York
programme.desc: In Paris, Fredrik's launch goes according to plan until another broker tries to stake his claim with the developer; Ryan contemplates a risky new career move; Luis makes an emotional revelation concerning his life in Paris.

programme.title: Million Dollar Listing New York
programme.desc: The kings of Gotham real estate are back, and they refuse to let a changing market stand in the way of big-time deals; Fredrik is back with a bang to help Rebel Wilson find a luxurious NYC pied- à -terre; Steve gets himself in a tricky situation.
